kitchen.description: Professional kitchen display for efficient order management and timing

dashboardAnalysis.title: Dashboard analysis

benefits1.title: Mobile Restaurant Experience
benefits1.subtitle: From QR scan to payment - everything on your guests' smartphones

menu.title: Browse Digital Menu
menu.description: Guests scan the QR code and view the complete menu on their phone

ordering.title: Place Order
ordering.description: Easily add items to cart without waiting for staff

payment.title: Secure Payment
payment.description: Payment via iDEAL, credit card or other payment methods without checkout

orderStatus.title: Track Order
orderStatus.description: Real-time updates on your order status, from kitchen to table

benefits2.title: Smart table management at a glance

smartAlgorithms.title: Smart algorithms
smartAlgorithms.description: AI calculates the best table layout, even during peak times

capacityWaitTime.title: Capacity & wait time
capacityWaitTime.description: Real-time predictions based on occupancy and order history

locationBasedService.title: Location-based service

automaticPlanning.title: Automatic planning
automaticPlanning.description: Reservations + walk-ins are automatically assigned & updated

dashboardDemoLoading: Welcome to TableTech – the smart hospitality demo!

contact.title: Schedule a Free Consultation

trial.title: Questions about the trial period?
trial.description: We'll explain how you can test for free for 14 days without obligations. Discover what TableTech can mean for your restaurant.

package.title: Which package suits you?
package.description: Free, Growth, Pro or Ultimate? We discuss your needs and recommend the best package for your situation and budget.

pricing.title: What does TableTech cost exactly?
pricing.description: Transparent pricing starting from free. We'll calculate together what the investment and expected ROI for your restaurant will be.

installation.title: How does the installation work?
installation.description: From QR codes to tablets - we discuss the complete installation process and how quickly you can be operational.

technical.title: Technical questions or concerns?
technical.description: Does it work with your POS system? What about training? All technical aspects will be covered.
